name: NYDailyNews
text:
Robert De Niro revealed he took raising biracial children "for granted," and talked about "scary" interactions with police.

He added that the topic of race is not one discussed much within his family.
https://t.co/A9SCLKEhxN

name: NYDailyNews
text:
Florida set a new record for daily coronavirus infections, at 1,902 new cases.

While the number reflects an increase in testing, it also shows an upward trend in the percentage of tests that come back positive.
https://t.co/zB6WAwjDTU

name: NYDailyNews
text:
Feds upped the ante in the case of the accused Brooklyn police vehicle bombers busted during George Floyd protests.

The three suspects face life sentences if they’re convicted of all charges brought in indictments.
https://t.co/2Ep6XSInHP

name: NYDailyNews
text:
Protesting French cops threw down their handcuffs over a chokehold ban.

“What’s happening in the United States today echoes with France,” said the sister of a black, Mali-French man who died while being restrained in police custody.
https://t.co/cFhk5bZYdk

name: NYDailyNews
text:
The head of the Chicago police union threatened to kick out any cops kneeling with protesters.

John  Catanzara, who has a controversial record, is under investigation related to a 2018 incident and therefore cannot actually walk the beat himself. https://t.co/sU4lvhtOO5

name: NYDailyNews
text:
"SNL" alum Jay Pharoah said LAPD drew guns, knelt on his neck and handcuffed him during a jog.

“You fit the description of a black man in this area with gray sweatpants on and a gray shirt,” the officers said when asked why they accosted him.
https://t.co/xinfgce5h6

name: NYDailyNews
text:
The NFL plans to observe Juneteenth — the oldest known celebration commemorating the ending of slavery in the U.S. — as a league holiday for the first time.
https://t.co/I8qqKWkpOQ

name: NYDailyNews
text:
Microsoft won’t sell facial recognition tech to police, joining Amazon and IBM.

Studies have found that current facial recognition technology misidentifies minorities much more often than white people.
https://t.co/0jeMTzQ3Z4

name: NYDailyNews
text:
EVERYBODY HATES BLAZ

Pilloried by friends and foes, NYC Mayor de Blasio’s fall from grace has been long in the making: https://t.co/4BfU7093se

Cuomo signs historic 50-a repeal bill, making N.Y. police disciplinary records public after decades of secrecy: https://t.co/UoXcDsEHkf https://t.co/MVKv86tXvJ

name: NYDailyNews
text:
The original Lady A blasted Lady Antebellum for changing their name to Lady A to shed the moniker’s pre-Civil War connotations.

It's still unclear what the A now stands for.
https://t.co/lyBMgVPYmT

name: NYDailyNews
text:
Trump rescheduled his Tulsa Juneteenth speech.

“Many of my African American friends and supporters have reached out to suggest that we consider changing the date out," Trump said. 

The rally will instead be held on June 20.
https://t.co/HETdGfLMJF

name: NYDailyNews
text:
Sharon Stone revealed she was struck by lightning and revived when her mother slapped her in face.

The 62-year-old Buddhist said she was picked up and thrown across the kitchen and hit the refrigerator during the freak accident.
https://t.co/mlUJ55nPvm

name: NYDailyNews
text:
The Confederate flag was banned at sporting events in Ireland.

Soccer fans of the Rebel Army in Cork are known to bring flags to games, so long as the color red is prominent, which sometimes included the Confederate flag.
https://t.co/9hY74OdyDp

name: NYDailyNews
text:
A vigil was held for Tylee Ryan and JJ Valow, Lori Vallow’s late children.

Tylee, 17, and JJ, 8, had been missing since September until their bodies were found Tuesday. Their mother and her husband are both charged in connection with their disappearances.
https://t.co/I6DTzJn47N
